item.title: Why Did Bitcoin Values Just Plummet? Ask Japan.

item.title: Feel Calmer and Less Stressed in Just 5 Seconds: Dr. Andrew Huberman Says Take a ‘Physiological Sigh’
item.description: Breathe in, and in, and then slowly and fully out. Do that, and you’ll feel calmer, more focused, and a lot less stressed.

item.title: My Employee Didn’t Tell Anyone She Was Pregnant
item.description: … until she was about to give birth!
